author: fwyzard
body:
#### PR description:

Add missing newlines at the end of the files under
```
RecoBTag/Combined
RecoBTag/ImpactParameter
RecoBTag/PerformanceDB
RecoEgamma/EgammaIsolationAlgos
RecoEgamma/EgammaPhotonProducers
RecoLocalCalo/Configuration
RecoLocalCalo/EcalRecProducers
RecoLocalCalo/HGCalRecProducers
RecoLocalTracker/Configuration
RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelRecHits
RecoLocalTracker/SiStripClusterizer
RecoLocalTracker/SiStripZeroSuppression
RecoLuminosity/LumiDB
RecoLuminosity/LumiProducer
RecoMTD/TrackExtender
RecoMuon/TrackerSeedGenerator
RecoMuon/TrackingTools
```
.

#### PR validation:

None.
title: Add missing newlines in Reconstruction modules
